Question
========

Below is a table showing the relationship between smoking and divorces.

  -------- ------------- ------ -------- Divorced?          
  Smoking?   Yes No Total Yes 247 289 536 No 343 802 1145 Total 590 1091 1681 -------- ------------- ------ --------

What is the probability that a nonsmoker is not divorced?

Solution
========

The correct answer is: 0.7
